notes.note:
Improved sidebar text contrast when using vertical tabs with certain themes. ([Bug 2006091][1])


  [1]: http://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2006091

Improved overall stability by fixing crashes related to browsing, graphics, and accessibility features. (Bugs [2001160][1], [1998185][2], [1998188][3])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2001160
  [2]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1998185
  [3]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1998188

Fixed an issue where fingerprinting protection caused incorrect font rendering on popular websites. ([Bug 2000429][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2000429

Fixed an issue where restoring a previous session could open an unexpected page instead of the default start page. ([Bug 2003307][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2003307

Fixed an issue that prevented desktop profile shortcuts from being unintentionally removed when changing copied profile settings. ([Bug 1998209][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1998209

Fixed crashes related to media playback and GMP process shutdown. ([Bug 2002697][1])


  [1]: https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=2002697
<strike>On Windows, clicking tabs may not work at the very top of the screen when Firefox is maximized on a second monitor. We’re working to fix this in a future release.</strike> (Fixed in 147.0)

system_requirements:
## Windows

### Operating Systems (32-bit and 64-bit)
 - Windows 10 or later

### Recommended Hardware
-  1 gigahertz (GHz) or faster compatible processor or System on a Chip (SoC)
-  1GB of RAM / 2GB of RAM for the 64-bit version
-  500MB of hard drive space

---

## Mac

### Operating Systems
- macOS 10.15 or later 

### Recommended Hardware
- Macintosh computer with an Intel x86 or Apple silicon processor
- 512 MB of RAM
- 200 MB hard drive space

---

## GNU/Linux

### Software Requirements

*Please note that GNU/Linux distributors may provide packages for your distribution which have different requirements.*

- Firefox will not run at all without the following libraries or packages:
    - glibc 2.17 or higher (glibc 2.28 or higher on arm64)
    - GTK+ 3.14 or higher
    - libglib 2.42 or higher
    - libstdc++ 4.8.1 or higher (libstdc++ 6.0 or higher on arm64)
    - X.Org 1.0 or higher (1.7 or higher is recommended)
- For optimal functionality, we recommend the following libraries or packages:
    - DBus 1.0 or higher
    - NetworkManager 0.7 or higher
    - PulseAudio
title: Firefox 146.0.1 Release
